item.title: 印度最大航空公司获准启动风险投资基金
item.description: 由 InterGlobe Aviation Ltd. 运营的印度最大航空公司 IndiGo 已获得印度市场监管机构的批准，将启动一项风险投资基金，以促进南亚国家旅游和航空市场的发展。【原文：India’s largest airline IndiGo, operated by InterGlobe Aviation Ltd., has received approval from the country’s markets regulator to launch a venture capital fund as it seeks to boost the South Asian nation’s travel and aviation market.】

item.title: ADP 收购埃利奥特支持的 WorkForce 软件公司
item.description: 自动数据处理公司收购了软件供应商 WorkForce Software，其支持者包括 Elliott Investment Management 和 Insight Partners。【原文：Automatic Data Processing Inc. has acquired WorkForce Software, a software provider whose backers included Elliott Investment Management and Insight Partners.】

item.title: 加拿大大举降息助推卢布创 2017 年以来最差走势
item.description: 在一份疲软的加拿大消费者物价报告加大了对加拿大央行将在未来几周加快放宽借贷成本的押注之后，卢比将遭遇七年多来最严重的连续下跌。【原文：The loonie is set for its worst run of losses in more than seven years after a soft report on Canadian consumer prices amped up bets that the Bank of Canada will ease borrowing costs by a quicker pace in the weeks ahead.】

item.title: 比特币突破 67,000 美元，达到七月以来最高水平
item.description: 比特币自 7 月份以来首次突破 67,000 美元，原因是美国股市的反弹有助于重新激发人们对加密货币等高风险资产的乐观情绪。【原文：Bitcoin surpassed $67,000 for the first time since July as a rally in US stocks helped to renew optimism for riskier assets such as cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰将曼哈顿西格拉姆大厦的业务扩展了 42
item.description: 全球另类资产管理公司蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Global alternative asset manager Blue Owl Capital Inc. is taking more office space at Manhattan’s landmark Seagram Building.】

item.title: 奥迪拒绝收购陷入困境的布鲁塞尔电动汽车工厂
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）旗下高端品牌奥迪（Audi）未能为其陷入困境的布鲁塞尔电动汽车工厂找到合适的投资者，这增加了该工厂关闭的风险。【原文：Volkswagen AG’s premium brand Audi has failed to find a suitable investor for its troubled electric-vehicle factory in Brussels, raising the risk that the plant could close.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称强势美元威胁股市反弹
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）认为，美元走强是有可能阻碍股市繁荣的少数几个障碍之一，股市繁荣已使美国股市创下一系列纪录。【原文：A stronger dollar is one of the few obstacles threatening to hamper the stock market boom which has lifted US stocks to a series of records, according to Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson.】

item.title: 随着越来越多的家庭开始测试市场，加拿大的房屋销售量和价格均有所上升
item.description: 在加拿大银行再次降息使抵押贷款利率下降之后，加拿大 9 月份的房屋销售量有所上升。【原文：Home sales in Canada edged higher in September after another interest rate cut by the Bank of Canada brought down mortgage rates.】

item.title: 阿联酋人工智能公司首席执行官否认英伟达芯片销售可能受限
item.description: 在有报道称拜登政府讨论了对向波斯湾国家销售先进的英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）芯片设置上限之后，阿拉伯联合酋长国顶级人工智能公司的负责人表示，美国对半导体技术施加更多限制并不让他感到意外。【原文：The head of United Arab Emirates’ top artificial intelligence firm said additional US restrictions on semiconductor technology wouldn’t surprise him after a report that the Biden administration discussed caps on sales of advanced Nvidia Corp. chips to Persian Gulf countries.】

item.title: 安哥拉计划利用世界银行4亿美元贷款为贫困人口提供更多援助
item.description: 安哥拉将延长低收入家庭现金转移计划，因为货币疲软和高通胀率继续推高这个非洲产油国的生活成本。【原文：Angola will extend a cash-transfer program for low-income families as a weaker currency and sky-high inflation continue to drive up living costs in the oil-producing African nation.】

item.title: ESG在新兴市场的吸引力逐渐减弱，因为追求利润让美德黯然失色
item.description: 随着环境、社会和治理战略在持续的资本外流和高收益能源债券的吸引下崩溃，新兴市场的可持续投资正面临着一场清算。【原文：Sustainable investments in emerging markets are facing a reckoning as environmental, social and governance strategies crumble under the weight of ongoing capital outflows and the appeal of higher-yielding energy bonds.】

item.title: 铂金股权投资公司支持的英迈目标 4.28 亿美元首次公开募股
item.description: 英迈控股公司（Ingram Micro Holding Corp）和支持者 Platinum Equity 计划在首次公开募股中筹集多达 4.278 亿美元的资金，以推动公司在下月美国大选前上市。【原文：Ingram Micro Holding Corp. and backer Platinum Equity plan to raise as much as $427.8 million in an initial public offering as companies push to go public before next month’s US elections.】

item.title: 戴尔将于下月出货采用新英伟达 Blackwell AI 芯片的服务器
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc.【原文：Dell Technologies Inc., one of the biggest sellers of server computers, will soon begin shipping devices featuring Nvidia Corp.’s Blackwell artificial intelligence accelerators, demonstrating that production of the chip is back on schedule.】

item.title: 谷歌重新设计购物页面，提供无限滚动功能和短视频
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌重新设计了其购物网站，以便更好地为消费者和商家店面牵线搭桥，从而将该平台与亚马逊等电子商务网站区分开来。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google redesigned its shopping website to better match consumers with merchant storefronts, seeking to distinguish the platform from e-commerce sites such as Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 比特币基础设施公司Blockstream融资2.1亿美元
item.description: 比特币开发商 Blockstream 公司通过发行可转换票据募集了 2.1 亿美元，将用于为公司第二层技术的推广、扩大采矿业务以及购买更多加密货币提供资金。【原文：Bitcoin developer Blockstream Corp. raised $210 million through a convertible note offering that will be used to finance the rollout of the company’s layer-2 technologies, expand mining operations and to buy more of the cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 摩根大通掀起大银行盈余后的借贷狂潮
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is the first of Wall Street’s six biggest banks to tap the US investment-grade bond market after reporting earnings, setting the stage for a potential flood of issuance from the banking giants.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩有望因 "黑钱 "被列入监察机构的 "灰名单
item.description: 黎巴嫩已经被全球债务市场拒之门外，预计将因在打击非法融资方面的不足而被列入监管机构的 "灰名单"。【原文：Lebanon, already locked out of global debt markets, is expected to be added to a watchdog’s “gray list” for shortcomings in tackling illicit finance.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦经济趋于稳定，资金重拾巴基斯坦地方债券
item.description: 在宏观经济环境不断改善的情况下，巴基斯坦的高收益率和稳定的货币推动了巴基斯坦地方债务的增长，这将是巴基斯坦地方债务五年来首次出现年度流入。【原文：Pakistan’s local debt is set for its first annual inflow in five years, buoyed by high yields and a stable currency in an improving macroeconomic environment.】

item.title: 停止称所有财富基金为主权基金：挪威基金之父
item.description: 挪威 1.8 万亿美元主权财富基金的创始首席执行官为那些希望效仿其成功经验的国家提供了一些建议：言辞很重要。【原文：The founding chief executive of Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund has some advice for countries seeking to emulate his success: words matter.】

item.title: 酱油生产商海天据称酝酿 15 亿美元香港上市
item.description: 中国最大的调味品生产商之一佛山海天调味食品股份有限公司正考虑在香港进行第二次上市，据熟悉情况的人士称，这次上市至少可以融资 15 亿美元。【原文：Foshan Haitian Flavouring & Food Co., one of the biggest condiment makers in China, is considering a second listing in Hong Kong that could raise at least $1.5 billion, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: Adnoc 将向 Fertiglobe 转让合成氨资产，提高产量
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的主要石油公司正寻求将部分氨资产转让给其下属的 Fertiglobe Plc 公司，并计划扩大这种低碳产品的生产。【原文：The United Arab Emirates’s main oil company is looking to transfer some ammonia assets to its unit Fertiglobe Plc and plans to expand production of the low-carbon product.】

item.title: 私募股权投资公司力争在利润下滑时仍保留红利
item.description: 私募股权公司正在争取更大的灵活性，以便即使在亏损的情况下也能给自己派息。【原文：Private equity firms are pushing for greater flexibility to give themselves payouts, even when they’re losing money.】

item.title: 分析师推崇英国银行股，称其为保护收益的对冲工具
item.description: 由于英国公司对冲固定收益的方式，利率上调带来的提振作用会持续更长时间，分析师对英国表现不佳的银行股的看法也变得更加积极。【原文：Analysts are turning more positive on the UK’s underperforming bank stocks, with the boost from higher interest rates seen lingering for longer due to the way British firms hedge their fixed-income earnings.】

item.title: 经过 "紧张 "的工作，Northvolt 报告救援谈判取得进展
item.description: 陷入困境的瑞典电池生产商 Northvolt AB 表示，该公司的救援方案谈判正在取得进展，并准备在本月晚些时候履行发薪义务。【原文：Sweden’s struggling battery maker Northvolt AB said it’s making progress in talks on a rescue package and is ready to meet its payroll obligations later in the month.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮引发澳大利亚养老基金向 DataBank 下注 20 亿美元
item.description:
数据中心开发商在美国建设三座大型设施的计划得到了澳大利亚超级保险公司（AustralianSuper）和数字桥公司（DigitalBridge）的支持。【原文：

The data center developer’s push to build out three large US facilities is being backed by AustralianSuper and DigitalBridge.

】

item.title: 马伦和威特科夫支持迈阿密博物馆价值 2500 万美元的建筑交易
item.description: Pretium 首席执行官唐-马伦（Don Mullen）和他的妻子阿曼达（Amanda）出资 2,500 万美元，支持一家免费向公众开放的艺术博物馆购买迈阿密的一栋建筑。【原文：Pretium Chief Executive Officer Don Mullen and his wife, Amanda, have helped to back the $25 million purchase of a Miami building by an art museum that’s free to the public.】

item.title: 中国政府承诺提供支持后，中国住建部计划举行情况通报会
item.description: 中国住房部将于周四召开新闻发布会，可能会提供更多有关支持中国下滑的房地产行业和促进经济增长的措施细节。【原文：China’s housing ministry will hold a press briefing on Thursday, likely providing more details of measures to support the country’s slumping property sector and bolster economic growth.】

item.title: 阿美取消沙特化工项目，专注亚洲市场
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）取消了在沙特王国建设炼油厂和化工项目的计划，并正在审查其他三个项目，因为该公司正在评估支出计划，重点是拓展亚洲市场。【原文：Saudi Aramco has canceled plans to build a refinery and chemicals project in the kingdom and is reviewing three others as it evaluates spending plans with a focus on expanding in Asia.】

item.title: ION 的里奇-格罗西（Rich Grossi）是金融科技公司离职的最新高管
item.description: ION 集团主要部门之一 ION Corporates 的负责人已经离职，这是这家金融数据提供商一系列高管变动中最新的一次。【原文：The head of ION Corporates, one of the main units of ION Group, has left the company, the latest in a series of high-profile executive changes at the helm of the financial data provider.】

item.title: 石油缓解通胀担忧，国债创两周最大涨幅
item.description: 由于油价下跌缓解了人们对通胀回升的担忧，国债创两周来最大涨幅。【原文：Treasuries rallied the most in two weeks as tumbling oil prices eased concerns about an uptick in inflation.】
